statements: SELECT * FROM SustainabilityData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint, energy_consumption FROM SustainabilityData;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityData WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint FROM SustainabilityData WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT id, company_name, energy_consumption FROM SustainabilityData ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityData WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint FROM SustainabilityData WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC
SELECT id, report_date, energy_consumption FROM SustainabilityData WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityData WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-03-31' AND (carbon_footprint > 70 OR energy_consumption < 200)
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint, energy_consumption FROM SustainabilityData WHERE company_name LIKE '%Inc%' ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT * FROM BusinessOperations;
SELECT business_name, location FROM BusinessOperations;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData;
SELECT operation_id, carbon_footprint, energy_usage FROM EnvironmentalData;
SELECT business_name, employees, sustainability_rating FROM BusinessOperations;
SELECT business_name, location, employees FROM BusinessOperations ORDER BY employees ASC;
SELECT * FROM BusinessOperations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT business_name, employees, sustainability_rating FROM BusinessOperations WHERE sustainability_rating IS NOT NULL;
SELECT b.business_name, e.carbon_footprint, e.energy_usage FROM BusinessOperations b INNER JOIN EnvironmentalData e ON b.op_id = e.operation_id;
SELECT b.business_name, e.carbon_footprint, e.energy_usage, e.waste_generated FROM BusinessOperations b LEFT JOIN EnvironmentalData e ON b.op_id = e.operation_id;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data;
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_data WHERE carbon_footprint > 500;
SELECT company_name, waste_generation FROM sustainability_data ORDER BY waste_generation DESC;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM sustainability_data s JOIN compliance_reports c ON s.id = c.company_id WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM environmental_standards;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data;
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_data WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT company_name, waste_generation, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_data ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT company_name, description FROM sustainability_data AS sd JOIN environmental_standards AS es ON sd.id = es.id;

SELECT sd.company_name, es.standard_name, cr.compliance_status FROM sustainability_data AS sd JOIN compliance_reports AS cr ON sd.id = cr.company_id JOIN environmental_standards AS es ON cr.environmental_standard_id = es.id WHERE cr.compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityData;
SELECT business_id, category, value FROM SustainabilityData WHERE value > 100;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Business WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT id, standard, status FROM Compliance ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpact WHERE impact_type = 'Carbon Emissions' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityData WHERE category = 'Emissions' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT s.category, s.value, b.name, b.location FROM SustainabilityData s INNER JOIN Business b ON s.business_id = b.id WHERE s.value > 100 ORDER BY s.value ASC;
SELECT b.name, b.industry, c.standard, c.status FROM Business b INNER JOIN Compliance c ON b.id = c.business_id WHERE c.status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY b.name;
SELECT b.name, e.timestamp, e.impact_type, e.value FROM Business b INNER JOIN EnvironmentalImpact e ON b.id = e.business_id WHERE e.impact_type = 'Waste' ORDER BY e.timestamp DESC;

SELECT b.location, s.category, s.value, c.standard, c.status FROM Business b LEFT JOIN SustainabilityData s ON b.id = s.business_id LEFT JOIN Compliance c ON b.id = c.business_id WHERE s.value IS NOT NULL AND c.status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT company_name, sustainability_score FROM sustainability_data;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE greenhouse_gas_emissions > 1000;
SELECT company_name, electricity_consumption, energy_date FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, waste_generated, recycling_rate FROM waste_management WHERE recycling_rate < 50;
SELECT id, company_name, report_type, report_date FROM sustainability_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_data ORDER BY company_name DESC, sustainability_score ASC;
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint, water_usage FROM sustainability_data WHERE sustainability_score > 70;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE greenhouse_gas_emissions > 100 OR pollutant_emissions < 10 ORDER BY emissions_date DESC;

SELECT SUM(electricity_consumption) AS total_electricity_consumption, AVG(natural_gas_consumption) AS average_natural_gas_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT company_name, report_type, report_date FROM sustainability_reports WHERE report_type LIKE 'Annual%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
